channel.title: Stuck on tram, please help
channel.description:
First thanks for making this wonderful game. I spent all night trying to get Black Mesa running due to the "cant load client library" mess. Finally got it running, loaded up fine i am on the tram ride getting giddy like a school girl on prom night. Sigh now im at the end of the tram ride just stuck here staring at the door wishing it would open and let me out. There is no NPC coming to open the door for me to let me out. Help please i must play this game?
Could some one maybe even upload a save file right after they exit the tram for me?

item.title: Stuck on tram, please help
item.dc:creator: Evopalaeo
item.description:
Did anyone have any luck fixing this?

Read full topic

item.title: Stuck on tram, please help
item.dc:creator: Evopalaeo
item.description:
Jokerine:

All I can think about is verifying the Source SDK Base files, and reinstalling BM again with the .exe. Download it again, if possible. Try it, and see if it works then - you may indeed be missing some files.

I’ve already re installed it a couple of times - to no avail. One more try tonight then I’m giving up. Definitely something going wrong with my installation - pretty sure everybody else has an options menu and can get out of the tram.

Read full topic

item.title: Stuck on tram, please help
item.dc:creator: TheOneAndOnly
item.description:
In the case of AI disabled, you can use the console command ai_resume. Sometimes you will have to type ai_disable, then ai_resume for it to work.

You can instead add
ai_norebuildgraph “1”
ai_disable “0”

to your autexec.cfg, but I’m not quite sure if this will work.

Read full topic

item.title: Stuck on tram, please help
item.dc:creator: Insomnautik
item.description:
Oh guys… Right click on Black Mesa in your Steam Games Library. Click Properties from the drop down menu. Then the Set Launch Options button, and type -console into the box. This should enabled your tilde (~) key for opening console. Then its just a matter of “sv_cheats 1” and “noclip” to toggle on and off.

Binding it to a key should help in case this bug reoccurs later in the game.
Type this in console:

bind n noclip

Or whatever key you want to replace N with.

Read full topic

item.title: Stuck on tram, please help
item.dc:creator: Ketran
item.description:
Just open the console and type in sv_cheats 1 press enter, then type in noclip and it will say noclip ON. Once you’re done just type noclip again and it will say noclip OFF.
